creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; two standing men wearing identical outfits with tan jackets, white shirts, yellow pants and black shoes, except man at right wears purple necktie; three stylized blue and brown buildings at top; pink and brown asterisk-like flower/star in LRC on white road with a blue-outlined striped cup on same white area; brown and black borders
inscription: on back in blue: 1762 | on back in pencil: EA 4
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: on back in pencil: Eddie Arning
title: Untitled (Two Figures)
